products.name: Aramex Express Envelope
products.description: Standard express shipping envelope for documents and small items. Durable, tamper-evident design with integrated tracking label. Suitable for domestic and international shipments up to 500g.

products.name: Aramex Freight Box - Medium
products.description: Medium-sized corrugated shipping box for general merchandise. Double-walled construction for maximum protection. Dimensions: 40cm x 30cm x 25cm. Ideal for e-commerce fulfillment.

products.name: Aramex Thermal Label Roll
products.description: Roll of 500 direct thermal shipping labels compatible with major label printers. Self-adhesive, smudge-resistant. Size: 100mm x 150mm per label.

products.name: Aramex Bubble Wrap Mailer
products.description: Padded bubble wrap mailer for fragile items. Lightweight, water-resistant outer layer with shock-absorbing inner lining. Available in multiple sizes.

products.name: Aramex Packing Tape - Heavy Duty
products.description: Industrial-grade packing tape for secure box sealing. 48mm wide, 100m per roll. High adhesion strength suitable for heavy packages and extended storage.
